original: dur khrod la sogs rgyal nyid sa thob nas //
analyzed: dur khrod la sogs rgyal nyid sa thob nas //
translated: And having attained the stage of the Victorious Ones in the charnel grounds and so forth,

original: tstshando la sogs sa la bgrod par shog / shin tu rnam par dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas rnam par grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: tstshando la sogs sa la bgrod par shog / shin tu rnam par dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas rnam par grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the TathÄgata is primordially liberated.

original: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag po yi //
analyzed: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag po yi //
translated: All-good, the lord of all,ğŸ”½may I become the chief of the bodhisattvas.

original: sras kyi dbang po nyid du bdag gyur cig / sa gsum mthar phyin gsum phrag gsum gnas gyur //
analyzed: sras kyi dbang po nyid du bdag gyur cig / sa gsum mthar phyin gsum phrag gsum gnas gyur //
translated: Having reached the end of the three levels, abiding in the three times three,

original: shes brgyad gyur pas ye shes lngar gyur te //
analyzed: shes brgyad gyur pas ye shes lngar gyur te //
translated: having become the eight kinds of knowledge, I become the five kinds of primordial wisdom.

original: ye shes chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i //
translated: Primordial wisdom, inseparable from the dharmadhÄtu,ğŸ”½may I attain the dharmakÄya, the essence of enlightenment.

original: chos sku byang chub snying po thob par shog / chos dbyings las byung nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'dra //
analyzed: chos sku byang chub snying po thob par shog / chos dbyings las byung nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'dra //
translated: Arisen from the dharmadhÄtu, like the characteristic of space,

original: thog ma dang ni tha ma med pa'i bdag / sems dpa' rdo rje thugs kyi bdag po ru //
analyzed: thog ma dang ni tha ma med pa'i bdag / sems dpa' rdo rje thugs kyi bdag po ru //
translated: without beginning or end,ğŸ”½may I become Vajrasattva, the lord of mind,ğŸ”½Vajrasattva himself.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bdag gyur cig / dngos grub ma lus pa ni kun gyi bdag / dbang phyug chen po lha yi lhar gyur pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bdag gyur cig / dngos grub ma lus pa ni kun gyi bdag / dbang phyug chen po lha yi lhar gyur pa //
translated: Lord of all accomplishments, the god of gods,

original: stug po'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyal //
analyzed: stug po'i rgyan gyur ma lus kun gyi rgyal //
translated: the king of all the ornaments of the dense array,

original: mi 'gyur dam pa nyid du bdag gyur cig / nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku mnyes pas //
analyzed: mi 'gyur dam pa nyid du bdag gyur cig / nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku mnyes pas //
translated: By pleasing the wisdom body, completely pure of afflictions,

original: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su rab chags la //
analyzed: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su rab chags la //
translated: I will follow after all who are attached to desire.

original: 'dod chags me kun rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
analyzed: 'dod chags me kun rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
translated: By the completely pure nature of the fire of desire,ğŸ”½may I become the lord of speech.

original: gsung gi dbang phyug nyid du bdag gyur cig / nga rgyal rnam dag mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: gsung gi dbang phyug nyid du bdag gyur cig / nga rgyal rnam dag mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub //
translated: By the completely pure pride, the spontaneous equality,

original: yon tan yid bzhin rgya chen mkha' 'dra ba //
analyzed: yon tan yid bzhin rgya chen mkha' 'dra ba //
translated: the wish-fulfilling qualities, vast like space,

original: gdul bya rdzogs sangs nyid du re skong ba //
analyzed: gdul bya rdzogs sangs nyid du re skong ba //
translated: fulfilling the hopes of disciples, perfect buddhas,ğŸ”½may I become the all-pervading lord, the vajra sun.

original: khyab bdag rdo rje nyi mar bdag gyur cig / phrag dong dag pas bya ba grub brnyes shing //
analyzed: khyab bdag rdo rje nyi mar bdag gyur cig / phrag dong dag pas bya ba grub brnyes shing //
translated: By the completely pure envy, the supreme attainment,ğŸ”½the oceans of emanations, the countless disciples,

original: phran las rgya mtshos gdul bya dpag med rnams / grub mchog phyag rgya che la dgod mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: phran las rgya mtshos gdul bya dpag med rnams / grub mchog phyag rgya che la dgod mdzad pa'i //
translated: are established in the supreme attainment of mahÄmudrÄ.

original: bde gshegs gdon mi za bar bdag gyur cig /
analyzed: bde gshegs gdon mi za bar bdag gyur cig /
translated: May I become the Sugata Amogha.ğŸ”½Having attained the body of glorious Cakrasaá¹ƒvara,

original: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi bdag / dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo'i sku grub nas //
analyzed: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi bdag / dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo'i sku grub nas //
translated: the nature of all sugatas of the three times,

original: nam mkha' dag dang mnyam pa'i mthu stobs kyis //
analyzed: nam mkha' dag dang mnyam pa'i mthu stobs kyis //
translated: By the power equal to the sky,

original: 'khor 'das ma lus 'dren pa'i dpal du shog //
analyzed: 'khor 'das ma lus 'dren pa'i dpal du shog //
translated: May I be glorious leader of all saá¹ƒsÄra and nirvÄá¹‡a.

analyzed: / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags rgyas pa slob dpon bhu ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The extensive daily confession of glorious Cakrasaá¹ƒvara composed by Master BhÅ«ripa is complete.

original: jo bo rje dang lots'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: jo bo rje dang lots'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
